name: Vita Great Escape
description:
Help the loliest magical girl of Lyrcal Nanha fight her way to freedom in this H Side-scrolling Action Game.
Use the directional keys + 2 buttons (attack, jump). Lots of pixel art animation.

  • 5 stages of enemies and loast bosses. Don't get fully declothed!
  • CG mode (game over assaults + special unlockable dot graphic art)
